name: Ethereal Armor
originalText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each enchantment you control and has first strike.

rulings.text: Ethereal Armor counts each enchantment you control, including itself and any Auras you control that are attached to an opponent or to permanents controlled by an opponent.
